title: Ticket #5180: Globus interface shift
description:
As reported on the HTCondor users list, the signature of globus_gsi_cred_write_proxy has changed from: 

globus_result_t globus_gsi_cred_write_proxy(globus_l_gsi_cred_handle_s*, char*)

to 

globus_result_t globus_gsi_cred_write_proxy(globus_l_gsi_cred_handle_s*, const char*)

Since the ABI is identical, a simple fix would be to reinterpret_cast the function pointer to the correct type. Testing locally, this seems to work on both the old and new headers.
